v. 1.0 - App for anyone logging the assets

1. bootstrap - two column layout
2. Money model (sum, type[in,out])
2a. How to input data ? - dialog and button
3. Highcharts
4. Seed of information

5. Enable categorization
	Money model (sum, type[in,out], category)

v. 2.0 - App for personalizaed logging

6. Add User model ( devise )
7. Add assotiation between user and money
8. Additional filtering


v. 3.0 Totally tested prototype

9. rspec (models, controllers)
10. factory_girl (models)
11. request testing
